actions.committee: Committee on Labor and Human Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Labor and Human Resources.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Labor and Human Resources
actions.text: Committee on Labor and Human Resources. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

official_title: A bill to provide for necessary medical care for certain persons detained, held hostage, or interned.
short_title: Civilian Ex-Prisoner of War Health Benefits Act of 1990

summary.text: Civilian Ex-Prisoner of War Health Benefits Act of 1990 - Entitles any person who was forcibly detained, held hostage, or interned, including those detained during World War II, the Korean conflict, the Vietnam conflict, or the Lebanese civil war, to necessary medical care for any injury or disability resulting from the period of internment or hiding. Directs the Secretary of Labor to establish an advisory committee known as the Former Civilian American Internee Committee.

titles.title: Civilian Ex-Prisoner of War Health Benefits Act of 1990
A bill to provide for necessary medical care for certain persons detained, held hostage, or interned.
